text: Penicillium piceum is an anamorph species of fungi in the genus Penicillium which can cause in rare cases chronic granulomatous disease.UniProtATCC This species has been isolated from human blood cultures and from pig lung tissue. Penicillium piceum produces β-glucosidase == Further reading == * * * * * * * == References == piceum Category:Fungi described in 1948
title: Penicillium piceum
